description:
***New in this Update***
Fixed a bug that prevented you from viewing last years service report.
Now compatible with the HP Touchpad
*********************

CallBook, the first Field Service organizer for webOS.

Callbook is an app that helps Jehovah's Witnesses organize their personal ministry. It helps you keeps track of your hours, return visits, placements & bible studies. Backup your calls to email. Transfer them to another witness. Look up your call by GPS. Set monthly goals and track your progress. Add an upcoming return visit to your calendar. Callbook automatically keeps track of your field service totals so you can email a report. 

Never be in the ministry without your call book again.
